rooms.description: A welcoming space designed in Art Deco style with geometric patterns and elegant lighting.
Spacious area with a central seating arrangement and decorative elements reflecting Art Deco aesthetics, opening towards the courtyard.
Modern dining space with Art Deco accents that overlooks the courtyard for a refreshing atmosphere.
Functional kitchen designed with modern appliances and Art Deco style cabinetry, positioned to maintain Vastu harmony by aligning with natural ventilation.
Guest room featuring elegant decor in line with the penthouse theme and Art Deco detailing, offering views of the courtyard.
Luxurious master suite complete with en-suite bathroom, private balcony facing the central courtyard, integrating Vastu principles by aligning the headboard towards the north-east.
Guest bathroom and ensuite attached to the master bedroom, designed with modern fixtures in an Art Deco style.

openings.description: Grand entryway with geometric Art Deco detailing and ample natural lighting.
A large opening leading to the central courtyard that serves as a communal garden space enhancing both aesthetics and Vastu flow.
